RelatedSentence: A man was shot in the leg in Baltimore Monday afternoon , police said .
The victim was in the 2000 block of Sinclair Lane in the Clifton Park neighborhood when a man approached him , shot him in the leg and ran off , police said .
The victim was in the 2000 block of Sinclair Lane in the Clifton Park neighborhood when a man approached him , shot him in the leg and ran off , police said .
No suspect identity or motive was known , police said .
The shooting is under investigating , and anyone with information may call Northeast District detectives at 410-396-2444 .
